data.name: STRANGER
data.detailed_description:
STRANGER is a PC First Person Thriller horror game with VR support developed by the indie developer and maker of SafeZoneVR.
-------------------
Gameplay: You will be defending your house against a STRANGER. Make use of the 2 provided locks and find the 1 Perma-Lock, lock the windows when you hear/see the STRANGER out the windows. Make it to 6 am when the police arrive to find yourself uncovering the mystery that lies behind this STRANGER.
--------------------
STRANGER Demo Note: The demo includes one map and one difficulty, at full release much more will be added including a fully rebuilt jumpscare/death system and more maps, new mechanics and features and much much more!
--------------------
You can choose different levels of difficulty and choose from different maps and uncover the story of your player, the STRANGER, and more. Hidden stories and lore-driven cryptic messages will be left to be discovered.

  • Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics and spatial audio will have you on your toes and your computer running well with the new UNREAL ENGINE 5 next-gen engine and RTX capability, giving you peak quality with little performance risk.
  • NonLinear Gameplay: The same thing will never happen twice, replay-ability and new events and an intelligent enemy will give you weeks of gameplay
  • Deep Story: For lore enthusiasts and mystery enthusiasts you will have to dig deep with the given information to help unravel the mystery behind the unknown STRANGER, hidden items, rare events (easter eggs), photos/trailers/audio cryptic messages to be discovered and much more. (Join the discord community to work together: https://discord.gg/73eeU6pr7b
  • Much More COMING SOON! Stay tuned as new features will be implemented/experimented with before the early access launch! You can also track development progress and see the roadmap here: https://trello.com/b/NxQjQOoR

data.short_description: Protect yourself against a STRANGER trying to break into your house, use the limited locks and look and listen where the intruder is coming from. Lock the windows, reset the power, stay focused. Survive until 6am and begin to unravel the mystery behind your sudden and mysterious STRANGER
data.reviews:
“I don't think a game has given me an adrenaline rush like Stranger does in years. STRANGER is overall a great game so far, and I feel it will get even better as the lifecycle goes on and more maps, mechanics, animations, etc. are added. My favorite part is the sheer ambience in the game. From the lightning and thunder outside, to the rustling of leaves, buzzing of bugs outside. The game has a high level of replayability, as the Stranger's AI is pretty difficult to predict at times, and he is a sneaky fella. I can undoubtedly say that the talented developer, Will has poured his heart and soul into the game, and will do exactly that in future updates as well as his future games. I met Will when he was about halfway done with the game, and I was immediately envious of his energy, ambition, drive and talent. Following along with the development of Stranger has inspired me to want to make my own game someday. 9/10 at its current stage”
9/10 – Nitro on Discord

“This game looks promising, the first thing I noticed was that it had multiple levels which is exciting, not what I expected. Atmosphere was absolute bliss (scary bliss lollll)”
9.5/10 – Landini Linguini on Discord

“"Overall a really cool game - That was pretty sweet man! I had a pretty good time with that one! Finally a game that doesn't rely on just jump scares and loud noises and a bunch of garbage. Its definitely creepy." (Quote from 19:40 in Video)”
FusionZGamer (3.5 Million Subscribers)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated Requirements for playable experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
